descriptors.description: Demonstrates Certificate Based Authentication and Pairing over BLE. This example utilizes TrustZone for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_csr_generator_tz_workspace
descriptors.label: bt_soc_csr_generator_tz_workspace
descriptors.description: Certificate generating firmware workspace. Software is generating the device EC key pair, the signing request for the device certificate, and other related data. The generated data can be read out by the Central Authority. This example utilizes TrustZone for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_ncp_esl_ap_freertos
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - NCP ESL Access Point FreeRTOS
descriptors.description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application with additional features to support the Electronic Shelf Label Profile ESL Access Point role. Note: Some BLE features unused by the ESL Access Point are removed compared to the NCP target application.

descriptors.name: bt_ncp_freertos
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - NCP FreeRTOS
descriptors.description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application. Runs the Bluetooth stack dynamically and provides access to it via Bluetooth API (BGAPI) using UART connection. NCP mode makes it possible to run your application on a host controller or PC.

descriptors.name: bt_rcp_cpc_freertos
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - RCP CPC FreeRTOS
descriptors.description: Radio Co-Processor (RCP) target application. Runs the Bluetooth Controller (i.e. the Link Layer only) and provides access to it using the standard HCI (Host-Controller Interface) over CPC (Co-Processor Communication) protocol through UART connection.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_csr_generator
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC Certificate Signing Request Generator (Secure Vault)
descriptors.description: Certificate generating firmware example. Software is generating the device EC key pair, the signing request for the device certificate, and other related data. The generated data can be read out by the Central Authority. This example utilizes Secure Vault for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_ibeacon_freertos
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC iBeacon FreeRTOS
descriptors.description: Sends non-connectable advertisements in iBeacon format. The iBeacon Service gives Bluetooth accessories a simple and convenient way to send iBeacons to smartphones. This example can be tested together with the Simplicity Connect mobile app.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_ibeacon_micriumos
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC iBeacon Micrium OS
descriptors.description: Sends non-connectable advertisements in iBeacon format. The iBeacon Service gives Bluetooth accessories a simple and convenient way to send iBeacons to smartphones. This example can be tested together with the Simplicity Connect mobile app.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_iop_test_freertos
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC Interoperability Test FreeRTOS
descriptors.description: This is a test procedure containing several test cases for Bluetooth Low Energy communication. This demo is meant to be used with the Simplicity Connect mobile app, through the "Interoperability Test" tile on the Develop view of the app.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_tz_secure_application
descriptors.label: Sample project for TrustZone Secure Key Library
descriptors.description: This project can be used as a reference implementation for creating secure applications with TrustZone for bluetooth products. This project makes a TrustZone secure library for running PSA libraries in the secure world.
